definition: mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Syntactics is a subject to study abstract formal connexion among the signs.
sentences.chinese: 符號學是研究符號之間的抽象形式聯繫的學科。

sentences.english: Semiotics is the bridge between people and the Game and Animation.
sentences.chinese: 符號學即是人與遊戲動漫溝通的橋樑。
這在符號學上來說是不可能的。

sentences.english: Peirce's Semiotics has great intellectual influence on Jakobson's linguistic thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 皮爾士符號學對雅柯布森語言學思想具有極大影響。

sentences.english: There is a Darwinian semiotics, understanding the relationships among species in semiotic terms.
sentences.chinese: 達爾文主義的符號學，用符號學來研究物種間的關係。

sentences.english: American philosopher Charles·S·Peirce fully advances the semiotic concepts and categories.
sentences.chinese: 美國哲學家皮爾士全面提出了符號學概念和研究範圍。

sentences.english: Semiotics is a hot point in western contemporary learning study.
sentences.chinese: 符號學是當代西方文化學術研究的一個熱點。

sentences.english: In a word, they form the word and symbol of the visual language.
sentences.chinese: 本文進一步對標誌構成元素進行符號學分析。

sentences.english: Semiotics was the first thing that smacked of revolution.
sentences.chinese: 然而符號學卻第一次給她帶來了一絲激進的味道。

sentences.english: The development of semiotics throws wholly new light on the translation studies.
sentences.chinese: 符號學的發展爲翻譯研究提供了一個全新的視角。

sentences.english: The ethnic minority literature provides a wide world for semiology to study and research.
sentences.chinese: 少數民族文學是符號學研究的廣闊天地。

sentences.english: Semiotics has expanded into every imaginable aspect of thought.
sentences.chinese: 符號學涉及幾乎任何學科。

sentences.english: An attempt is made to analyze cognitive linguistics from a semiotic perspective.
sentences.chinese: 本文試圖對認知語言學作符號學分析。

sentences.english: The Sacred Crow provides us a typical analytical text of semiotics.
sentences.chinese: 《神烏賦》給我們提供了一個典型的符號學分析文本。

definition: the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
(idiom) to freely air one's views/to be heard far and wide/to attract a lot of attention
